apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your Sahara API key for authentication

enableLogging.title: Enable Logging
enableLogging.description: Enable or disable info/warning logs. Error logs are always enabled. Defaults to true.

tls.title: TLS Configuration
tls.description: TLS/SSL configuration options. Use { "rejectUnauthorized": false } to bypass SSL certificate validation (required due to Sahara's SSL certificate mismatch).

rejectUnauthorized.description: Set to false to bypass SSL certificate validation
